string-array.name: phrasesArraySun
string-array.item: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
You lose every chance you don't take advantage of.
Failure is the spice that gives flavor to success.
Until we are committed, there will be hesitation!
If you don't know where you want to go, any path will do.
If you believe it makes all the difference.
Risks must be taken, because the greatest danger is to risk nothing!

string-array.name: phrasesArrayHappy
string-array.item: Not knowing it was impossible, went there and did it.
You are not defeated when you lose, you are defeated when you give up!
When it's darker we see more stars!
Insanity is always doing the same thing and expecting a different result.
Don't stop when you're tired, stop when you're done.
What can you do now that has the biggest impact on your success?
